thread.title: BRIEF-Canadian Tire Corporation Says Q1 Same Store Sales Rose 5.2 Pct

title: BRIEF-Canadian Tire Corporation Says Q1 Same Store Sales Rose 5.2 Pct
text:
May 10, 2018 / 10:28 AM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-Canadian Tire Corporation Says Q1 Same Store Sales Rose 5.2 Pct Reuters Staff
May 10 (Reuters) - Canadian Tire Corporation Ltd:
* CANADIAN TIRE CORPORATION REPORTS CONTINUED MOMENTUM IN FIRST QUARTER RESULTS * Q1 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 5.2 PERCENT
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$1.38 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* CONSOLIDATED RETAIL SALES INCREASED $164.4 MILLION OR 6.4% IN Q1
* CANADIAN TIRE - QTRLY CONSOLIDATED REVENUE INCREASED $93.5 MILLION, INCLUDING $51.1 MILLION INCREASE IN PETROLEUM REVENUE FROM HIGHER PER LITRE GAS PRICES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
